body: Ok.  I figured out why this is happening but I haven't found a solution yet as it's largely an issue with OpenStudio.  It seems that Openstudio will assign numbers to the ideal air loads systems based on the order of in which zones are connected to the OpenStudio component.  However, OpenStudio will write the zones into the IDF using a different order that I have not yet been able to understand.  Let me take some time to figure this out.
